title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame for Teams Meeting Rooms on Windows
description: Cloud IntelliFrame makes non-AI cameras smarter.  With Cloud IntelliFrame, participants in the room appear similar to remote attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for everyone. Whether working from home or in the office, participants are able to see every facial expression and cue, just as if they were there in person. This feature is available only with the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.
